fields_of_interest: Single market, Sport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Sports; gambling; anti-money laundering; data protection, consumer protection; justice and home affairs
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: An annual event in Brussels; integrity report
goals__remit:
ESSA (Sports Betting Integrity) was established in 2005 by the leading online sports book operators in Europe to monitor any irregular betting patterns or possible insider betting from within each sport.  
 
To achieve this goal ESSA implemented an early warning system between its members that highlights any suspicious betting activity. The Early Warning System allows ESSA to work with the Sports Regulators and their disciplinary and legal department, ensuring that when an alert is given the regulator is informed immediately which may prevent the possibility of any game manipulation on a given event.
